HomePage.title: Welcome to Consulting Inc.
HomePage.description: Your trusted partner for studying, working, and doing business in Romania.
HomePage.hero-title: Crossing Paths: The Journey to New Horizons
HomePage.hero-subtitle: From Turkmenistan to Romania, we guide students, professionals, and entrepreneurs toward real opportunities — building futures shaped by knowledge, courage, and connection.
HomePage.about-subtitle: Your reliable consulting partner in Romania
HomePage.about-description: At Consulting Inc., we help people from Turkmenistan study, work, and build successful businesses in Romania. Our mission is to make every step clear and simple — from university applications to work permits and business setup. With deep local expertise and international experience, we provide personalized support to help you adapt, grow, and achieve your goals abroad. Together, we turn your ambition into real success.
HomePage.why-us-section-title: Your Bridge to Success in Romania
HomePage.why-us-section-subtitle: We combine local knowledge, international experience, and personal guidance to make your journey to Romania smooth, confident, and successful.
HomePage.services-subtitle: Helping You Study, Work, and Do Business in Romania
HomePage.services-description: We support students, professionals, and entrepreneurs from Turkmenistan in reaching their goals in Romania. Whether it’s studying at a university, finding a job, or starting a company, our consulting services simplify the process and guide you every step of the way.
HomePage.ready-to-get-started-subtitle: Contact us today and discover how we can help you study, work, or grow your business in Romania.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.description: Comprehensive consulting solutions for studying, working, and doing business in Romania.
ServicesPage.hero-title: Helping you succeed — from education to career and business in Romania.
ServicesPage.hero-description: At Consulting Inc., we provide expert support at every step of your journey to Romania. Whether you’re applying to a university, searching for a job, or planning to start a business, our team offers clear guidance, reliable assistance, and personalized solutions to help you achieve your goals with confidence.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: Discover our mission, vision, and the team guiding students, professionals, and entrepreneurs toward success in Romania.
AboutPage.hero-subtitle: We help students, professionals, and business owners from Turkmenistan navigate education, career, and business opportunities with confidence and clarity.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: Have questions or need guidance? We're here to support you. Reach out via the form below or using our contact details.
ContactPage.contact-form-subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form and we'll respond as soon as possible.
ContactPage.invalid-email-error: Please enter a valid email address
ContactPage.name-too-short-error: Name must be at least 2 characters

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.description: Read our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal data while using our consulting services for education, work, and business in Romania.

TermsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.description: Read our terms of service to understand the rules, responsibilities, and guidelines for using our consulting services for education, work, and business in Romania.
